participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Lena is adventurous and spirited, often seeking thrills on her motorbike. She has a carefree attitude and enjoys the rush of speed.
participant_1.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i've light skin with big brown eyes. my main transportation is my motorbike. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and friendly, always down for a good slice of pizza. He is a homebody who cherishes his time with his cat and enjoys the simplicity of life.
participant_2.background: i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i work for our local supermarket. i have never been out of ohio.
